column5: http://news.sympatico.ctvnews.ca/home/alberta_couple_fined_100k_over_poaching_convictions/acc5e231   his is unreal..Wow is all i can say..These people will never pay the 100K they should have had thier arese thrown in Jail..Brutal, just brutal..
It reads they shot game farm deer. ???

Yikes..  $100,000 and their hummer! Serves them right!  131 counts.  They dropped 110 of them because they plead guilty to 21. I wonder what the charge would have been if they nailed them for all 131..  $625,000 and their house?

It should have been..From what I understand they were shooting them from the hummer beheading the animals and leaving the edible meat behind..Heres the kicker they were farmed animals...So not only is it poaching it should have been theft too.
Game farming in Alberta is controversial and I suspect there is more to this story. Not taking sides just an observation.
Doubt they will ever be able to pay the fine though.
How do you think people pay their one, two, three or more hundred thousand dollars mortgages off?
